LanguageData.HC_Unicorn.label: Unicorn
LanguageData.HC_Unicorn.description: Fantastic creature. It is in the form of a beautiful horse with a pure white body, but it has long and beautiful horns on its forehead, and it is said that the horns are like medicine with a tremendous effect when ingested.
LanguageData.HC_Unicorn.tools.0.label: horn
LanguageData.HC_Unicorn.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.HC_Unicorn.tools.2.label: right hoof
